EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-C00056.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Boost your company’s success!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Global Partner Program Partners,
Getting certified can boost your company’s success. As our valued partner, the Nokia Global Partner Program rewards partners who invest in the expertise of their staff. That’s right. Once your staff completes the required certifications, your company can move to the next tiers for product, services, and software discounts.
Our industry recognized Nokia certifications can:
- Enhance your company's capabilities - Improve your reputation with enterprise customers - Generate higher customer satisfaction
You are rewarded with higher discounts that help you improve your own profitability, and give you more flexibility in the prices you can offer your customers.
Get certified. Become accredited today. Your pathway to success! Nokia Partner Marketing & Communications Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
